pr_title: Add API of getting Singleton service's version information

timeline.message: Add API of getting Singleton service's version information
fix CI failure problem: add copyright header for new added file
fix CI unit test failure problem
fix CI unit test failure problem

timeline.bodyText: The value of build.version should be overwritten in the build.gradle and the value should come from the cmd parameter of build creation, right? But i don't see how this work.
timeline.author: linr211

replies.bodyText: Have synced this with @junw-33455432 , he will overwrite the version value when publish build, as the same with what he did for the existing builddate&buildnumber&branch, so I needn't write such task.
replies.author: huihuiw01

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:vmware/singleton into master_addVersionAPI
